sentences.sentence: And analysis of I Ching hexagrams remarks on the impact of body later speech.
sentences.translation: 并分析了《易经》的卦爻辞对后世辞体产生的影响。

sentences.sentence: In the operas of the Yuan and Ming, there are lots of descriptions related to the Zhouyi and hexagrams.
sentences.translation: 在元明戏曲中，有不少对于《周易》及《易》卦的描写。

sentences.sentence: The Mayan calendar relate to the 64 hexagrams of the Chinese system, I Ching, which is one of the most precisely astrological horoscopes.
sentences.translation: 建立在透过自然发现的主要的数学系统上。马雅历法，与中国易经的64卦（最精准的占星星相之一）。
